attributes.action: legalise nursery and schoolchildren education of the dangers of using unsupervised toilets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Young children using unsupervised toilets are in great danger.
Predators and perverts prey on the vulnerable.
Many parents are unaware that these men loiter in and around them.
Children are abused and their innocence violated by these evil uncaring men.
Legalise the education of children as a matter of urgency.
Mothers and fathers truly care.
